text: I didn't want to go out and change anything. I just wanted to make the music that was part of my background, which was rock and blues and hip-hop.
author: Kid Rock

text: It didn't even occur to me that I'm the last person in the world who should play salsa or Brazilian music.

text: I've noticed a lot of younger artists have less fear of doing different sorts of things, whether it's various types of music, or gallery artists moving between video and sculpture and drawing.
